message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it. I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $100 right now. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $125. Let me know if that works for you!
Alice, I really appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still stuck at $110.  It's the best I can do right now.  Let me know what you think.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $127.50. Let me know if that's acceptable to you!
